repo.name: BZ repo
repo.description: Hi quest player and welcome to the repo! I do not own these games. I just make it easier to find them in Sidequest.Have fun.

apps.description: I've recreated Slender Man on my Oculus Quest to scare my girlfriend.
apps.name: Slender Man Replica
apps.summary: A horror game where you collect pages being chased in the forest.

apps.description: The Rat King is a atmospheric piece with an innovative locomotion mechanism. It is mainly meant to be explored, but there may be dangers hidden in a future update.
apps.name: The Rat King
apps.summary: A seemingly endless forest to stroll through and get lost in. There are rumors of an exile deep in its stony heart.

apps.description: Everyone's going to be there! Enjoy our beautiful mall! Eat at our delicious food court! Buy amazing products, from music, to baked goods!
apps.name: Mall Cop VR
apps.summary: You have been invited to a grand-opening bash at your local mall!

apps.description: With the new capabilities of the Gear VR headset, Veronika will be able to tell where you're looking, and what you're looking at...
apps.name: VR Dates
apps.summary: Experience the awkwardness of a blind date in Virtual-Reality.

apps.description: Warrior is a 3 minute energising VR experience set in an underground cave environment  with bubbling, rock-spitting magma, spikey stalagmites and circling bats. Ready your sword and defend yourself now from the rock-firing
apps.name: Warrior
apps.summary: Feeling  sluggish and unmotivated? It's time to get battle ready - Play Warrior to get your adrenaline pumping and be ready to take on any task.

apps.description:
Becka’s portfolio and story follows her life from a young child through her struggle and eventual recovery from an eating disorder. As such, this project is meant to act as a conversation piece around topics like self-image, abuse, coping and addiction. 

Throughout the project, users are placed in a series of thematic rooms. Each room reflects a moment in Becka’s journey and is accompanied by a set of equally thematic paintings that can be completed by the user along with audio from a fictionalized version of Becka’s life written by the artist herself. Each one of these rooms essentially makes a gallery, a place where the artwork stands in the context of Becka’s life.
apps.name: It's not me
apps.summary: It’s Not Me is an interactive VR experience featuring the work of Boise-based artist Becka Watkins.

apps.description:
Controls

Move left/right (including menus)
-A/D (Keyboard)
-Left stick/horizontal Dpad (PS4 Dualshock)
-Left stick (Oculus Quest)

Fire/select
-Space (Keyboard)
-Circle (PS4 Dualshock)
-A (Oculus Quest)

Jump
-Left Shift (Keyboard)
-Left Trigger (PS4 Dualshock)
-Left Trigger (Oculus Quest)
apps.name: Tempus
apps.summary: Guide a sphere along bright, geometric shapes. Shoot at enemies to earn points.

apps.name: Mazadventure VR
apps.summary: You are lost in a randomly generated maze, find the exit ..

apps.description: Exploring different limited-palette, solid color (unlit) aesthetics, and avoiding the use of lighting/shadows.
apps.name: The Unkindled Gallery VR
apps.summary: This is a collection of experimental feel-good artsy minigames for VR

apps.description:
This game is designed for the Oculus Quest only! You will also need to sideload the game in order to play it. I recommend using SideQuest

Play Symphony of Stars how you like! Fly around gazing at the stars and planets, or engage in combat, take over planets and build your faction's empire! If you choose the later, you'll need to use a bit of strategy as there are other factions vying for control of the system in the game. Build up resources, and properly leave planets defended before moving on the attack.

Features:
-3 Different playable factions, each with their own style of ship
-Randomly generated maps, each game is different!
-AI Difficulty levels, and team settings. Up the AI difficulty and try to take them down with a friend if you'd like!
-Online multiplayer, play with up to 9 other humans or hone your skills against the AI!
apps.name: Symphony of Stars
apps.summary: Fly around gazing at the stars and planets, or engage in combat, take over planets and build your faction's empire!

apps.description: The game is a mix of escape room, game of dexterity in a horrifying atmosphere.
apps.name: GhostLine
apps.summary: GhostLine is a prototype developed for oculus for Oculus Quest.

apps.description:
After the downfall of civilization, the world is dominated by mechaaaas.
Those giant robots are fighting to take control over the remains of the humans' technology.
You too, join this battle of EPIC proportions and become the strongest of all mechas.
Take part into VR gigantic fights. Over 100 players in an unforgiving arena !
That multiplayer experience will blow your mind !
Developed by the talentuous Team 6, inspired by the popular Agar.IO (+ Fortnite).
apps.name: MECHA.IO
apps.summary: Take part in VR gigantic fights.

apps.description:
He said:

"Things aren’t working out between us anymore."
"It’s time that we start seeing other people."
"It’s not you, it’s me. You’re too good for me ,I’m not good enough for you."
"We should probably break up."
apps.name: After Break VR
apps.summary: A woman asked her ex boyfriend why he broke up with her.

apps.description:
Available on Oculus Quest (preferred) and Steam VR.

Use any available details to build pipeline for the meatballs to fed the Labrador.

Controls: Trigger or Side button to grab, Thumbstick to teleportation.
apps.name: Labradory

apps.description:
This game was a four week school project at Yrgo, Gothenburg, made for the Oculus Quest.

Made by:
Amie Faily
Philip Åkerblom
Kian Parsa
Johan Appelgren
Robin Arkblad
apps.name: Overlord VR
apps.summary:
You are a mighty god trying to protect your quiet village of devout worshippers.
Now the evil spiders are attacking! Use your god powers and stop them!

apps.name: Simple Bowling VR
apps.summary: Virtual reality 10 pin Bowling with Score Board.

apps.description:
Sometimes you need to just get away from it all and drive for a really long time. Downpour Drive it about that feeling.

___

Downpour Drive is a work in progress. Updates to the game will continue until we're satisfied that it's done, but for the time being development is on hold while the team works on other obligations.
apps.name: Downpour Drive
apps.summary: A VR game about picking the right song to set the mood, keying the ignition and driving down an infinite road one dreamlike evening.

apps.description:
In Project Overload you are a little robot who is infiltrating a facility guarded by many other robots. If they're find you, they're will kill you. You need  to access the central server to accomplish your final objective.

Infiltration in VR
Confort. The game is made for playing in a sitting position.
Immersive soundtrack.
Stressful experience.
About the development:

Project Overload is a project made in 6 weeks  by 5 peoples as part of a training in game development. In it's current state, the game is not properly finished, it may receive updates later on. It was made primary for the Oculus Quest but it's also working with the Rift.
apps.name: Project Overload
apps.summary: If they're find you, they're will kill you.
